title: What a Billionaire Taught Me
itunes:title: What a Billionaire Taught Me
description:
5 years ago, a billionaire taught me this lesson. In today's episode, I am going to teach you that lesson so that you can use it in your life!

 

Want to master your mindset? Every Monday I send out an email with mindset tips for the week, click here to receive that email: http://mondayemail.com/

Follow me on IG for more inspiration here: https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
